name: The Island Escape
description:
Welcome to The Island Escape, this game was made during the Kenney Jam 2021, the theme is Rotation. We hope you have as much fun playing it as we had developing it!

Programmer: Chandler Pope-Lewis
Level Designer: Isabela Bruna Rojas (TheMightyChloroplast)

Find all 6 collectibles to escape the island! Just remember, the clock is ticking.

Controls:
Move Forward: W
Move Backward: S
Move Left: A
Move Right: D
Run: Shift
Pickup Item: E
Open Map: M
